title: OpenAI Assistant Files Integration Inputs
description: Use Apify's dataset and update OpenAI Assistant Files

dataset_id.title: Dataset ID
dataset_id.description: Dataset ID (when running standalone without integration)

fields.title: A list of fields which should be picked from the items
fields.description: A list of fields which should be picked from the items, only these fields will remain in the resulting record objects.

file_ids_to_delete.title: Array of Assistant file ids to deleted
file_ids_to_delete.description: Delete specified file ids (OpenAI does not allow to update a file)

file_prefix.title: Delete/Create Assistant files with a prefix
file_prefix.description: Specifying a file prefix simplifies the management of Assistant files updates by avoiding the need to track all file IDs.
